scripts.watch: bun build --watch --sourcemap=inline --no-clear-screen --minify --format=iife --outfile=build/dist/content.js src/content/index.ts & bun build --watch --sourcemap=inline --no-clear-screen --minify --format=iife --outfile=build/dist/injected.js src/injected/index.ts
scripts.build: bun build --minify --format=iife --outfile=build/dist/content.js src/content.ts && bun build --minify --format=iife --outfile=build/dist/injectedjs src/injected.ts
